Name: Draco VR Dragon Sim
About the game: Vr Physics sandbox Demo. Very Early access to support the game. There are completely physically simulated bipedal robots and dragons that can be interacted with by your hands and objects. there is a system for moving large objects via 'telekinesis'. there is a sword that can be stabbed into enemies. there is an egg that you can summon to your hand and can be used for teleportation locomotion and for controlling Draco the dragon.
